m_szDocTitle: All-Wheel Drive Tesla Model S Next Year? | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: All-Wheel Drive Tesla Model S Next Year? August 6th, 2013 by Zachary Shahan   Word on the street is that Jo’s Tesla truck concept is a no-go, but that Tesla may be released an all-wheel drive version of the Model S next year. I know there are many people who basically demand all-wheel drive on any vehicle they buy. Even with the Model S being the best mass-production car in the world, I’m sure some of them would still hold out for an all-wheel drive Tesla.
